name: Artisan: Going Home Again
description: A well intended promise between friends leaves Ellie devastated when her parents decide to sell her childhood home. Now it seems the only chance this sweet but clumsy waitress has to save both the house and her word is to pursue an unlikely career in the one thing she's actually good at: Art.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10 Processor: 1.0 Ghz Memory: 256 MB RAM Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10 Processor: 2.0 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 100 MB available space
